summary: Pumpkins are a type of winter squash, often orange and round. They are believed to have originated in North America and are now grown worldwide. With a history dating back to 7000 BCE, pumpkins are one of the oldest cultivated plants. Their seeds and pulp are edible, making them popular in dishes like pie, especially during Thanksgiving. Pumpkins are also used for decorations, such as jack-o'-lanterns at Halloween. Different varieties are grown for culinary and decorative purposes.
title: Pumpkin
